name: bfj
notes: Big-Friendly JSON - Asynchronous streaming library for parsing/serializing large JSON files using Node.js filesystem operations (fs.createReadStream, fs.createWriteStream, fs.readFile, fs.writeFile). Designed for build-time/Node.js server environments to process large JSON files without blocking the event loop. Not applicable to Workers which lack persistent filesystem access and operate in a stateless request/response model. For JSON processing in Workers, use standard JSON.parse/JSON.stringify or the Streams API for streaming large payloads.
